name: TaskJiffy
0:
”Alexa, open TaskJiffy”
”Alexa, tell TaskJiffy I'm bored”
”Alexa, tell TaskJiffy I have some free time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: task jiffy
des: Have you waited around for a few minutes (e.g before a meeting or a TV show begins), wondering if there’s a task you could complete really quickly? TaskJiffy suggests tasks that you can complete in a few minutes to help you make use of these small chunks of time while also helping you become more organized and mindful. The suggested tasks can help you get organized at work (e.g send some quick emails) or at home (e.g unload the dishwasher) or become more mindful (e.g take a few deep breaths) and caring (e.g text your loved one to say “I love you”).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
